original_text: And he took him by the right hand, and lifted him up: and immediately his feet and ankle bones received strength.
korean_text: 오른손을 잡아 일으키니 발과 발목이 곧 힘을 얻고

sentences.original_text: And he took him by the right hand
and immediately his feet and ankle bones received strength
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 즉시 그의 발과 발목 뼈에 힘이 생겼다
